title: Pay Attention to Me - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Hiding True Abilities   Modern Day   Mpreg   Multiple POV   Omegaverse   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Seme Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past
author: Little Ice Cube   冰块儿
description:
In a certain city, there are two school tyrants.

One: not sociable, not prone to puppy love, addicted to studying and progressively growing more anti-social; Alphas and dogs, please don’t disturb me, thank you.

The other: My omega must be lovable, obedient, cute, and able to give me a litter of babies…….a beta? I won’t consider one, no thank you.

One day, these two school tyrants meet.

Jiang Yao: Brat, you can’t tell the good from the bad.

Jiang Yao: Brat, you’re actually quite cute.

Jiang Yao: Brat…..give me a baby?

Yin Che: Get lost.>
